Name: The Midnight Wind
About the game: The Midnight Wind is a sarcastic single-player pixel art RPG following the story of four hosts of the souls of a dead star. The story loosely takes place in Indonesia, where players will embark on a bare-bones journey to protect themselves and their people. The four hosts are named Altara, Osmos, Nabur, and Torren Voldusaya, the bratty children of a royal family. The game currently includes - 110 different enemies to encounter - 80 different weapons and armors to equip - 10 characters to play as including an unlockable character - Approximately 15 hours of gameplay - 190+ different items to collect - 'Interesting' dialogue Current version 1.3 Beta
